mapper.sql: ID, COMPANY_DIC_ID, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, COMPANY_PWD, PAY_TYPE, ENTRY_TIME, ORG_ID, IS_DEFAULT, MONTH_CODE, SEND_SITE
mapper.insert: insert into KDI_COMPANY (ID, COMPANY_DIC_ID, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, COMPANY_PWD, PAY_TYPE, ENTRY_TIME, ORG_ID, IS_DEFAULT, MONTH_CODE, SEND_SITE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyDicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{monthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
COMPANY_DIC_ID,
COMPANY_ACCOUNT,
COMPANY_PWD,

mapper.update:
update KDI_COMPANY
COMPANY_DIC_ID = #{companyDicId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_PWD = #{companyPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ENTRY_TIME = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT},
MONTH_CODE = #{monthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_SITE = #{sendSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update KDI_COMPANY set COMPANY_DIC_ID = #{companyDicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_PWD = #{companyPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ENTRY_TIME = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, MONTH_CODE = #{monthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_SITE = #{sendSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, COMPANY_DIC_ID, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, COMPANY_PWD, PAY_TYPE, ENTRY_TIME, ORG_ID, IS_DEFAULT, MONTH_CODE, SEND_SITE from KDI_COMPANY

select a.ID as id,a.COMPANY_ACCOUNT as companyAccount, a.COMPANY_PWD as companyPwd, a.PAY_TYPE as payType ,a.ENTRY_TIME as entryTime, a.ORG_ID as orgId ,a.IS_DEFAULT as isDefault, a.MONTH_CODE as monthCode ,a.SEND_SITE as sendSite,b.COMPANY_NAME companyName,b.COMPANY_CODE as companyCode from KDI_COMPANY a ,KDI_COMPANY_DIC b where a.COMPANY_DIC_ID =b.ID and a.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update KDI_COMPANY SET IS_DEFAULT=true where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update KDI_COMPANY SET IS_DEFAULT=false where ID != #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.ID as id,a.COMPANY_ACCOUNT as companyAccount,a.COMPANY_DIC_ID as companyDicId , a.COMPANY_PWD as companyPwd, a.PAY_TYPE as payType ,a.ENTRY_TIME as entryTime, a.ORG_ID as orgId ,a.IS_DEFAULT as isDefault, a.MONTH_CODE as monthCode ,a.SEND_SITE as sendSite,b.COMPANY_NAME companyName,b.COMPANY_CODE as companyCode from KDI_COMPANY a ,KDI_COMPANY_DIC b where a.COMPANY_DIC_ID =b.ID and a.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
